articles.title: Genome-wide characterization of circulating metabolic biomarkers - Nature.com
articles.description: A meta-analysis of genome-wide association studies for 233 circulating metabolites from 33 cohorts reveals more than 400 loci and suggests probable causal genes, providing insights into metabolic pathways and disease aetiology.
